pullRequest.title: Standby Connection Loss Fix
pullRequest.bodyText:
Overview
Description:

Fix Issue when Standby connection is lost
Fix replication server graceful shutdown
Add logging
Adjust default and configurable lock values: monitor, renewal, lease duration and lease check

nodes.bodyText: What is the original value? The monitoring can be smaller so that when the lease expires, the other waiters can get hold of the lease quickly.
Can we make the monitor fraction bigger such as 10 or 20, so that the lease acquire/release can happen with smaller delay?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -52,6 +54,16 @@
      */
     private static final int FETCH_THRESHOLD = 300;
 
+    /**
+     * Fraction of Lease Duration for Lease Renewal
+     */
+    private static final int RENEWAL_LEASE_FRACTION = 4;
+
+    /**
+     * Fraction of Lease Duration for Lease Monitoring
+     */
+    private static final int MONITOR_LEASE_FRACTION = 2;
+

nodes.bodyText: is it better to rename to lockClient?
Will it cleaner to call lock.shutdown in the server shutdown call?
When will this callback be called? Which component detects the connection down?

      */
     private static final int FETCH_THRESHOLD = 300;
 
+    /**
+     * Fraction of Lease Duration for Lease Renewal

nodes.bodyText: does it need to be concurrent?
Can you add a comment saying what these tests do?
